mellasonic.nipped.interactable

Class Collider

  • java.lang.Object
    • mellasonic.nipped.interactable.Collider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Interactive
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Rectangle

    public abstract class Collider
extends java.lang.Object
implements Interactive
    The default interactive type for point and click games

      • hit

        protected abstract boolean hit(double x,
                               double y)
        returns whether or not the cursor hits the collider
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate relative to bounding box
        y - y coordinate relative to bounding box
        Returns:
        whether or not the cursor is considered to be within the "interactive range" of the object
